output.sentences: The texas monument at its library of it's hero is a nice one.
The next landmark is amazing as well.
The texas sign makes you feel a sense of nostalgia.
The mural inside of the library on the wall is colorful, and gives a sense of Texas history.
As you leave the library the scene of nature is breathtaking.
